input.sentences: there were a lot of people at the race today .
all of the riders had been training very hard for today .
they were very determined to win .
afterward i spent some time wandering the area .
output.sentences: There were two people riding their bikes.
One of the bike riders was very tired from all of his training.
He got back up and was determined to practice so he could win.
He was going as fast as he could.
On the sideline, his girlfriend was cheering for him.
